favourite.article: Living, acting, having our being according to the spirit.
The Spirit Himself should be—our rule and our way, our principle, goal constantly, following the inner sense—of life and peace!
Enjoy walking with the Lord so much! This is my life, my destination!

As Christians, walking with God must be our common walk. It is hard to do but as long as we long for Him, we love Him, we can do it and it will be part of our lives. In our experience of walking with Him, we can enjoy the newness of life, and even the sweetness of His life. Hallelujah for this WALK! :)
